TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Parius, title = Parius, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parius} }

S.FORM: Parius i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Parius. u kasalumaluma' nu Parius sa, 88 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 246 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 236 ku tademaw, pakalatu 96%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 10 ku tademaw, pakalatu 4%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 94%, Bunun 1%.

Parios i Pingtong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Parios. o kasalomaloma' no Parios sa, 88 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 246 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 236 ko tademaw, pakalato 96%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 10 ko tademaw, pakalato 4%. o kasabinacadan, Paiwan 94%, Bonon 1%.
